backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report placeholder with no features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme setup defining light and dark OKLCH color variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app orchestrating password gate, entry flow, background audio, and all content sections.
frontend/src/components/AmbientBackgroun: Canvas-based floating emoji particle animation rendered behind all content.
Audio controller for looping background music with play and mute toggles.
frontend/src/components/BirthdayMessageP: Dialog popup showing a styled birthday message with floating heart and sparkle effects.
frontend/src/components/EmojiHeader.tsx: Sticky animated emoji header cycling through icons.
frontend/src/components/EntryOverlay.tsx: Full-screen animated intro overlay prompting the user to enter the site.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with background image, gradients, and birthday text blocks.
Modal that displays a love letter with a typing animation and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/memories/ImageMe: Flippable memory card that lets users upload and validate JPG images and shows an associated message.
Loads, displays, and manages a list of image memory cards with persistent storage.
frontend/src/components/memories/VideoMe: Loads and displays a grid of video memory tiles, initializing defaults and saving updates.
Tile allowing upload and validation of MP4 or MP3 media and displaying the chosen file.
frontend/src/components/PasswordGate.tsx: Password entry screen that unlocks content after validating a hardcoded password.
Section with a button to open the love‑letter modal and additional birthday messages.
frontend/src/content/loveLetter.ts: Exports the full love letter text used in the modal.
frontend/src/content/romanticMessages.ts: Exports an array of romantic messages used in memory cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status management via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend query methods exist.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, glass and 3D card components, and animation utilities for the UI.
frontend/src/lib/localMemoryStore.ts: Handles loading and saving image and video memory objects to localStorage with simple JSON persistence.
frontend/src/lib/sessionFlags.ts: Manages session-scoped flags for unlocked and entered state using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, plugins, and content paths including custom soft-pink and rose-gold palettes.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature set, architecture notes, and requirements for the romantic birthday website.
